xz42_bb26.server.view

Interface IView2ModelAdapter<Room,User,ChatUser>


  • public interface IView2ModelAdapter<Room,User,ChatUser>
    Adapter that the view uses to communicate to the model.
    Author:
    bb26, xz42

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IView2ModelAdapter NULL_OBJECT
      The adapter to model

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void chatWith(java.lang.String ip)
      Connect to the RMI Registry at the given remote host, and grab the stub from that registry.
      void getListRooms(java.lang.String ip)
      Get list of rooms the remote user is involved with
      void joinChatroom(Room rm)
      Upon given a chatroom to join, create a local chatroom and add existing users in the given chatroom into the local chatroom.
      void quit()
      Quits the applications and gracefully shuts down the RMI-related resources.

    • Field Detail

      • NULL_OBJECT

        static final IView2ModelAdapter NULL_OBJECT
        The adapter to model

    • Method Detail

      • quit

        void quit()
        Quits the applications and gracefully shuts down the RMI-related resources.

      • chatWith

        void chatWith(java.lang.String ip)
        Connect to the RMI Registry at the given remote host, and grab the stub from that registry. Then create a local chatroom with the remote user represented by the given IP address, and inform the remote user to create a local chatroom
        Parameters:
        ip - The remote IP address to connect to.

      • joinChatroom

        void joinChatroom(Room rm)
        Upon given a chatroom to join, create a local chatroom and add existing users in the given chatroom into the local chatroom. Then broadcast to users in remote chatroom to add my stub into their local chatrooms.
        Parameters:
        rm - the chatroom to join

      • getListRooms

        void getListRooms(java.lang.String ip)
        Get list of rooms the remote user is involved with
        Parameters:
        ip - The remote user's IP address
